author: jvanzyl
msg: o separating the distribution site from the documentation site. if everything
pans out with ibiblio then all artifacts will go to the central repository
so nothing to do with distribution will need to be specified in the POM.
artifacts will go to the central repo and be mirrored. but we will allow
for projects that don't want to distribute via the central repo. if
<distributionSite|Directory> are defined then they will be obeyed.

author: werken
msg: If no <resources> tag exists in project.xml under <build>, then
return an empty Resources object.
PR: MAVEN-9

author: jstrachan
msg: Added support for dependency types. This allows us to use the type of dependency in the maven build to do things like
* document which dependencies are for unit testing and which dependencies are for compiling. (This can help us avoid circular compile dependencies)
* allow a reduced list of dependencies for real compile-time dependencies yet allow a larger number of dependencies to be used for unit test cases and sample programs
There are 2 helper methods now on dependency, isCompileType() and isTestType(). So from Jelly these can be used as
<if test="${dependency.compileType}">
etc.

author: jstrachan
msg: patch to use the latest snapshots of digester and jexl

author: jvanzyl
msg: o adding the use of the xml-commons 'which' utility which reports some
information about the environment maven is running in. Hopefully this
should help us debug problems easier as we can easily collect info
from users as they can cut and paste the output from 'maven -i'
